title: 78/657/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 July 1978 on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus described as 'Beckman Dynograph Recorders, type R-511 A', equipped with 9872 couplers, Statham UC3 transducers and UL5 accessories
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 12 July 1978  on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus described as "Beckman Dynograph Recorders, type R-511 A", equipped with 9872 couplers, Statham UC3 transducers and UL5 accessories  (78/657/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Beckman Dynograph Recorders type R-511 A", equipped with 9872 couplers, Statham UC3 transducers and UL5 accessories, is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1978.
For the Commission
Ătienne DAVIGNON
Member of the Commission  (1)OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 316, 6.12.1975, p. 17.
